caption.text:
Strawberry and Kiwi Berry Margarita
-
45mls Reposado Tequila
15mls Cointreau 
15mls strawberry Liqueur 
45mls freshly squeezed lime juice
5 very soft kiwi berries (cut up into small pieces)
-
Place all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and really shake vigorously until combined. Double strain into your favourite cocktail glass.
-
Spotted on @the_margarita_mum
-
Tag a friend you would love to share this delicious drink with!
-
Follow @artofdrinks for more beautiful cocktails üç∏
